steps.name: Siemplify_Assign Case
steps.description: Assign case to specific user or usergroup

steps.name: Siemplify_Update Case Description
steps.description: Ability to set Case Description from playbooks.

steps.name: Siemplify_Case Comment
steps.description: Add a comment to the case the current alert has been grouped to

steps.name: Siemplify_Change Priority
steps.description: Automatically change case priority to the given input

steps.name: Siemplify_Add General Insight
steps.description: Add a general insight configurable message to the case

steps.name: Siemplify_Case Tag
steps.description: Add given tag to the case the current alert is grouped to
